body: Its the fucking Seamen of the SS Ayase again.

Actually, more like three or four times, but still... The thing is, the Netorare tag is defined in such a way, that it actually wouldn't be applicable here, as strange as that may seem. While I personally agree with you on the nature of this work's content, I also can't deny that the tagging here is solid, at least in regard to whether or not Netorare is appropriate. This sort of thing already treads a precarious trapeze of morality, and this genre, even moreso. ...Sorry, bud. That's all I can say.
